// Pivot 0, 0
int MiniBlocker[18] = {
	17, 54,
	1, 32,
	1, 10,
	6, 0,
	15, 0,
	17, 6,
	21, 22,
	41, 41,
	23, 52
};

	0.414634f, 1.000000f,
